data.title: Victoria‚Äôs Secret Model Lais Ribeiro Has Stretch Marks and Fans Are Thrilled at How Relatable That Is
data.meta_description: Victoria‚Äôs Secret model Lais Ribeiro walked the runway baring her stretch marks and the Internet went wild.
data.text:
Sometimes it can feel like models and actresses are a whole different kind of human. Whenever we see them in the pages of magazines or on TV screens, they're often photoshopped or have the benefit of professional hair and makeup. While that's totally cool and part of their job, it can make us regular people feel a little inadequate. That's why people were so thrilled to watch Victoria's Secret Angel Lais Ribeiro walk the runway in China at the Victoria's Secret Fashion show last week, baring tiny stretch marks on her thighs without a care in the world and still looking fantastic as ever.

Ribeiro is a Brazilian supermodel and has been modeling for Victoria's Secret for a while now. According to Yahoo, a major fan of the brand noticed in some photos from the runway show that she's sporting some stretch marks on her outer thighs and posted about it on Instagram, saying, "She is an [sic] human, like you and me. She have stretch marks like all the girls! and that's not ugly. Stretch marks are beautifulüíñüå∏ Love your body! It's the only [one] you will have."

Instagram content

This content can also be viewed on the site it originates from.

X content

This content can also be viewed on the site it originates from.

Stretch marks sure are common, and definitely are not ugly as @victoriassecret_passion points out. Most commenters on the photo loved it, saying things like, "That is my favorite part of the photo" and "I have this too and it's not a prob üòçüòò.." Others took to Twitter to comment. User @lanadelpoe says, "Lais Ribeiro has stretch marks on her ass and y'all have no idea how good it makes me feel about mine." Yep and yep.
